title: SpheraWorld

comments.author: Big-Dude
comments.body: Wow, they are really offering free NFTs.I recommend everyone to give it a try.

comments.author: SpheraWorld
comments.body: Thank you, We will be sharing more details very soon and other documents such as the PitchDeck and the OnePager.We are offering 5000 Free NFTs for our early subscribers.

comments.author: SpheraWorld
comments.body: BTCUpdateBTCWe are going to reveal our NFTs in less than 2 weeks.Users will soon can create account on our platform

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: "PFPs are exclusive to early regional adopters of the Sphera Ecosystem"Does this mean only those who live in Arab or Middle East and North African countries are eligible to receive this airdrop? Or it's open to everyone, worldwide?BTW, You should consider running any sort of promotional marketing within the forum like a signature, or bounty campaign to extend your reach and exposure. If you have that planned and are in need of someone to help you guys out, do let me know, I'd be glad to assist you.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: SpheraWorld on January 09, 2023, 04:46:41 PMThank you, We will be sharing more details very soon and other documents such as the PitchDeck and the OnePager.We are offering 5000 Free NFTs for our early subscribers. that's a lot of free NFTs. is it really free or your subscriber needs to pay a lil bit of fee for something. because if it is totally free, how can you create its value in the market? many have tried on sports related project. if you don't have solid backing, you can easily abandon this platform. so do you think your foundation is rock solid to sustain its presence in the crypto community?

comments.author: SpheraWorld
comments.body: Quote from: julerz12 on January 16, 2023, 02:33:30 PM"PFPs are exclusive to early regional adopters of the Sphera Ecosystem"Does this mean only those who live in Arab or Middle East and North African countries are eligible to receive this airdrop? Or it's open to everyone, worldwide?BTW, You should consider running any sort of promotional marketing within the forum like a signature, or bounty campaign to extend your reach and exposure. If you have that planned and are in need of someone to help you guys out, do let me know, I'd be glad to assist you.Thank you for your interest in our project.The giveaway is open to everyone and not limited to certain regions.Feel free to invite your communityWe are planning to do a proper airdrop campaign in the future.

comments.author: SpheraWorld
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on January 16, 2023, 10:09:18 PMQuote from: SpheraWorld on January 09, 2023, 04:46:41 PMThank you, We will be sharing more details very soon and other documents such as the PitchDeck and the OnePager.We are offering 5000 Free NFTs for our early subscribers. that's a lot of free NFTs. is it really free or your subscriber needs to pay a lil bit of fee for something. because if it is totally free, how can you create its value in the market? many have tried on sports related project. if you don't have solid backing, you can easily abandon this platform. so do you think your foundation is rock solid to sustain its presence in the crypto community?Thanks for your interest!To answer your questions:Yes it is totally free. No fees to be paid, let me explain how: In the next 2 weeks, Sphera Marketplace will generate a wallet for each user who registers on the platform. Later we will be airdropping the NFT ourselves to your wallet. You will be able to withdraw the NFT to your wallet or leave it there until we launch our marketplace where you could trade.Here are the key benefits of the SpheraHead:- Enter weekly raffles to win up to $1,000 worth of Sphera tokens- Pre-access to the upcoming NFT launch- VIP access to all Sphera World products and eventsWe are working on bringing more utility with our partners.We are backed by:- Deca4: is a global advisory and consultancy company focusing on providing best practices to help its clients in the implementation of new technologies and practices, as well as other forms of financial and legal advise in advancing its clients business. You can view the list of partners on the website.- Kooora: has an average of 30 million monthly users in addition to over seven million followers on its social media channels, covering more than 42 different sports, with football the most popular.We have partnered with football players and other companies.More details will be shared soon!

comments.author: Big-Dude
comments.body: I claimed my NFT on the Beta platform!I guess you could give it a try
